bill_title: repeal certain index factors regarding the taxation of real property.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to repeal certain index factors regarding the taxation of real property. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 10-13-35.5 be repealed. 10-13-35.5. The county or municipality may increase the total amount of revenue payable from taxes on real property in any year up to the maximum amount calculated in accordance with § 10-13-35.4 utilizing any unused index factor from the prior three years. However, such an amount may not exceed the prior three year index factor total or ten percent, whichever is less. Section 2. That § 10-13-35.3 be amended to read: 10-13-35.3. Any county or municipality may decrease the total amount of revenue payable from taxes on real property below the maximum limit allowed by § 10-13-35 in any year. The decrease may not affect the amount of revenue payable that may be raised in accordance with §§ 10-13-35.4 and 10-13-35.5. 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.161 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
